title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Autonomous AI with Trusted Data (ISV318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 用可信数据驱动自主AI (ISV318)
abstract: Agentic AI demands more than good models—it needs great data. In this session, learn how Reltio’s agentic data fabric, powered by Amazon Bedrock, delivers real-time, trusted data to autonomous agents. See how Reltio AgentFlow™ and the Match Resolver agent, developed in collaboration with AWS GenAI Innovation Center, drive real-world results, reducing manual costs by up to 70%. You’ll leave with a clear view of what makes data “agentic” and how to start deploying agents that act—not just suggest.
abstract_cn: 代理式AI不仅需要优秀的模型，更需要卓越的数据。在本次会议中，了解Reltio的代理式数据架构如何借助Amazon Bedrock为自主代理提供实时、可信的数据。了解Reltio AgentFlow™和与AWS GenAI创新中心合作开发的Match Resolver代理如何推动实际业务成果，将人工成本降低高达70%。您将清晰了解什么是"代理式"数据，以及如何开始部署能够采取行动而非仅提供建议的代理。
